name: Mualani
source: Reward for inviting Mualani to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Surfshark Wavebreaker
skills.descriptionraw: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112142]</color> to self, then enter <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112141]</color> and gain 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>"Nightsoul points."</color> (This skill cannot be used after the character enters <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112141]</color>)\n(Characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112142]</color> attached can use the Technique: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S1121422]</color>)
skills.descriptionreplaced: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bitey Shark</color> to self, then enter <color=#FFFFFFFF>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> and gain 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>"Nightsoul points."</color> (This skill cannot be used after the character enters <color=#FFFFFFFF>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>)\n(Characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bitey Shark</color> attached can use the Technique: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sharky Surfboard</color>)
skills.description:
Attach Bitey Shark to self, then enter Nightsoul's Blessing and gain 2 "Nightsoul points." (This skill cannot be used after the character enters Nightsoul's Blessing)
(Characters with Bitey Shark attached can use the Technique: Sharky Surfboard)

skills.name: Boomsharka-laka
skills.description: Deals 2 Hydro DMG, summons Shark Missile.
